entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
